name: Greek Girl Makeover - Greece Goddess Of Beauty
name_original: Greek Girl Makeover - Greece Goddess Of Beauty
description:
To impress the people in Greek Kingdom The beautiful Greek Princess Makeover has chosen her Prince Charming For Her wedding prepare to go Greek Wedding Salon for spa and make up like a Greek princess.
Greek Princess dress in the most beautiful winter outfits and get her ready for the Royal Greek Princess Express your unique sense of style with this magical, Greek fashion games! play some awesome beauty and dress up games.If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Greek Girl Makeover, then this game was made for you! In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles of Greek Princess Makeover, with unforgettable makeups of goddess road.

Help to Greek Princess to look beauty with new fashion stylist. Greek Girl Wedding Salon present greek princess makeup and costume. Every greek doll want to look like bridal fashion girls in her own greek Kingdom
Help her to look fabulous in wedding

First, come to the spa room in my house and help me clean up. Apply facial cleanser for me, and rinse my face with shower nozzle. In addition, flaws on my face should be eliminated here too, such as trimming eyebrows, covering freckles, squeezing acnes and etc. As a Goddess, my face should be smooth and flawless.

Here we come up with real greek princess makeover game for your girl makeover little princess with the real dress and makeup kit.Enjoy unlimited fun with the Super luxurious greek makeup and other western dresses as well.

Girls wedding is So important to them because the memory will be with them for a whole life .in wedding time girls dressup treditionally and behave with the glance.

-Greece-themed salon game, in which you can experience intense exoticism.
-Various of realistic and interactive spa tools with intuitive controls and lots of fun.
-Tons of cosmetics: eyeliners, eyeshadows, mascaras, lipsticks, blushers and etc. Use them for countless times and make millions of combinations!
-Elaborately designed hairstyles, accessories, Greek dresses and shoes for you to choose from. Make a Greek Goddess of your own.
-This app is totally free and has no in-app purchases. Please feel free to use it.
